name: player_snaps
expected_query: with "t99ec2031f7623f960a0210041b13ea19" as (select "nfl_snaps"."gsis_it_id", COUNT(*) as rate_type_total_count from "nfl_plays" inner join "nfl_snaps" on "nfl_plays"."esbid" = "nfl_snaps"."esbid" and "nfl_plays"."playId" = "nfl_snaps"."playId" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "play_type" in ('PASS', 'RUSH') and "nfl_plays"."year" in (${constants.current_season.stats_season_year}) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_snaps"."gsis_it_id") select "player"."pid", t99ec2031f7623f960a0210041b13ea19.rate_type_total_count as player_snaps_0, "player"."pos" from "player" left join "t99ec2031f7623f960a0210041b13ea19" on "t99ec2031f7623f960a0210041b13ea19"."gsis_it_id" = "player"."gsis_it_id" group by t99ec2031f7623f960a0210041b13ea19.rate_type_total_count, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
